snippet.title: spellloom - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3587900/spellloom/

spellloom is a roguelike bullet-hell dungeon crawler with deep spell-building. Play as a Spellweaver—an intrepid QA tester employed by a cynical Dungeon Architect—and brave his chaotic creation. Prepare for fierce Combat, creative Spell Crafting, and perilous Exploration in the ever-shifting Void.
